All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
Direct Known Subclasses:
UINodePopupMenuForList, UIViewPopupMenuForList
public abstract class UIBaseListPopupMenu
extends UIBasePopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class has generic methods for the right-click menu options for list and list node right-click menus

Author:
Michelle Bachler
